sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO pmember (userid, userpass, email, name, birth, phonenum) VALUES (#userid#, #userpass#, #email#, #name#, #birth#, #phonenum#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT name FROM pmember WHERE userid = #userid# AND userpass = #userpass#
SELECT userid, email, name, phonenum, to_char(birth, 'yyyy-mm-dd') birth FROM pmember WHERE userid = #userid#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pmember WHERE userid = #userid# AND userpass = #userpass#
UPDATE pmember SET userpass = #userpass# WHERE userid = #userid#
